title: Commando Risk - The Movie.avi
description:
Untouchables Risk - The Movie 720p Avi HD

Commando Risk - The Classic Movie- Reduxed By me, thats what i am calling these, i have a following for them on vimeo and ive been tinkering with video editing for years and music. I took Escape from new york, gave it a new story and resubtitled it. Its gritty, funny and its very different, it centers around the players from a game called risk 2 at warzone. Being a DJ i used many classic songs from across the board from the killers to meatloaf and the cranberries with each scene, and the music is what makes it what it is. If its for you, and you can give it a shot ive made a series of these and this is the first in a series of 7 reduxes which together make an awesome series. You Tube wont let me have it, Vimeo took my premium account down, yet i made something new so here it is, enjoy GM_CSH

This is the third in the risk redux series
